00025 #include <korebot/korebot.h>
00026 #include <linux/joystick.h>
00027 #include <signal.h>
00028 
00029 
00030 int sendflag   = 0;
00031 int timeflag   = 0;
00032 int actionflag = 0;
00033 int sock;                        /* Socket descriptor */
00034 
00035 #define ACT_KOA  0
00036 #define ACT_CAM1 1
00037 #define ACT_CAM2 2
00038 #define ACT_BOTH 3
00039 
00040 void handle_kill(int arg)
00041 {
00042   fprintf(stderr, "arg... killed\r\n");
00043   shutdown(sock,2);
00044 
00045   close(sock);
00046 
00047   exit(1);
00048 }
00049 
00050 void handle_joyaxis(int number, int value, char * echoBuffer)
00051 {
00052   static int campos0=0,campos1=0,campos2=0,campos3=0;
00053 
00054   switch(actionflag)
00055   {
00056       /* Moving camera 1 */
00057     case ACT_CAM1 :
00058       if(number == 1) {
00059         campos0 = ((value*50)/32767) + 50;
00060         //sprintf(echoBuffer,"movecamera %d %d\n",campos1,campos0);
00061         ksock_send_command(sock,"movecamera %d %d",campos1, campos0);
00062         //sendflag = 1;
00063         timeflag = 0;
00064       }
00065 
00066       if(number == 0) {
00067         campos1 = 50 - ((value*50)/32767);
00068         //sprintf(echoBuffer,"movecamera %d %d\n",campos1,campos0);
00069         ksock_send_command(sock,"movecamera %d %d",campos1, campos0);
00070         //sendflag = 1;
00071         timeflag = 0;
00072       }
00073       break;
00074 
00075       /* Moving camera 2 */
00076     case ACT_CAM2 :
00077       if(number == 1) {
00078         campos0 = ((value*50)/32767) + 50;
00079         //sprintf(echoBuffer,"movecamera2 %d %d\n",campos1,campos0);
00080         ksock_send_command(sock,"movecamera2 %d %d",campos1, campos0);
00081         //sendflag = 1;
00082         timeflag = 0;
00083       }
00084 
00085       if(number == 0) {
00086         campos1 = 50 - ((value*50)/32767);
00087         //sprintf(echoBuffer,"movecamera2 %d %d\n",campos1,campos0);
00088         ksock_send_command(sock,"movecamera2 %d %d",campos1, campos0);
00089         //sendflag = 1;
00090         timeflag = 0;
00091       }
00092       break;
00093 
00094       /* Moving both camera */
00095     case ACT_BOTH :
00096       if(number == 1) {
00097         campos0 = ((value*50)/32767) + 50;
00098         sprintf(echoBuffer,"moveboth %d %d\n",campos1,campos0);
00099         sendflag = 1;
00100         timeflag = 0;
00101       }
00102 
00103       if(number == 0) {
00104         campos1 = 50 - ((value*50)/32767);
00105         sprintf(echoBuffer,"moveboth %d %d\n",campos1,campos0);
00106         sendflag = 1;
00107         timeflag = 0;
00108       }
00109       break;
00110   }
00111 }
00112 
00113 void handle_joybutton(int number, int value, char * echoBuffer)
00114 {
00115   switch(number)
00116   {
00117     case 2 :
00118       if(value)
00119         actionflag = ACT_BOTH;
00120       else
00121         if(actionflag == ACT_BOTH)
00122         {
00123           //sprintf(echoBuffer,"moveboth %d %d\n",50,50);
00124           //sendflag = 1;
00125           actionflag = ACT_KOA;
00126         }
00127       break;
00128     case 3 :
00129       if(value)
00130         actionflag = ACT_CAM2;
00131       else
00132         if(actionflag == ACT_CAM2)
00133         {
00134           sprintf(echoBuffer,"movecamera2 %d %d\n",50,50);
00135           sendflag = 1;
00136           timeflag = 1;
00137           actionflag = ACT_KOA;
00138         }
00139       break;
00140     case 4 :
00141       if(value)
00142         actionflag = ACT_CAM1;
00143       else
00144         if(actionflag == ACT_CAM1)
00145         {
00146           sprintf(echoBuffer,"movecamera %d %d\n",50,50);
00147           sendflag = 1;
00148           timeflag = 1;
00149           actionflag = ACT_KOA;
00150         }
00151       break;
00152     case 10 :
00153       /* init camera */
00154       if(value)
00155         ksock_send_command(sock,"initcamera");
00156       break;
00157   } 
00158 }
00159 
00160 #define RCVBUFSIZE 32   /* Size of receive buffer */
00161 
00162 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00163 {
00164     struct timeval lastcommand, now, diff;
00165     struct timezone here;
00166 
00167     char *servIP;                    /* Server IP address (dotted quad) */
00168     unsigned short servPort;         /* Echo server port */
00169     char echoBuffer[RCVBUFSIZE];     /* Buffer for echo string */
00170     unsigned int echoStringLen;      /* Length of string to echo */
00171     int bytesRcvd, totalBytesRcvd;   /* Bytes read in single recv() 
00172                                         and total bytes read */
00173     int fd;
00174     int readevent;
00175     struct js_event e;
00176 
00177     /* Set signal handler */
00178     signal(SIGINT, handle_kill);
00179 
00180     /* Set the starting time */
00181     gettimeofday(&lastcommand,&here);
00182     
00183     if (argc < 3)     /* Test for correct number of arguments */
00184     {
00185        fprintf(stderr, "Usage: %s <Server IP> <Port>\n", argv[0]);
00186        exit(1);
00187     }
00188 
00189     /* Open the Joystick device */
00190     fd = open ("/dev/input/js0", O_RDONLY|O_NONBLOCK);
00191     if(fd < 0)
00192     {
00193       printf("Cannot open joystick(/dev/input/js0)\r\n");
00194       exit(1);
00195     }
00196 
00197     servIP = argv[1];             /* First arg: server IP address (dotted quad) */
00198 
00199     servPort = atoi(argv[2]); /* Use given port, if any */
00200 
00201     ksock_init('\n',2048);
00202         
00203     sock = ksock_connect(servIP, servPort);
00204     if(sock > 0)
00205       printf("Connected to %s:%d\r\n",servIP,servPort);
00206 
00207     /* Start reading event from the joystick */
00208     readevent = read (fd, &e, sizeof(struct js_event));
00209 
00210     while (readevent >=0 || sendflag || errno == EAGAIN)
00211     {
00212       if(readevent >= 0)
00213       {
00214         /* A new event is available */
00215         e.type &= ~JS_EVENT_INIT;
00216         switch (e.type)
00217         {
00218 
00219           /* Handle joystick button event */
00220           case JS_EVENT_BUTTON:
00221             //printf("Button %d at pos %d\n", e.number, e.value);
00222             handle_joybutton(e.number,e.value,echoBuffer);
00223             break;
00224 
00225           /* Handle joystick axis event */
00226           case JS_EVENT_AXIS:
00227             //printf("Axis %d at pos %d\n", e.number, e.value);
00228             handle_joyaxis(e.number,e.value,echoBuffer);
00229             break;
00230         }
00231       }
00232 
00233       /* Send the command to the server if required */
00234       if(sendflag) {
00235         /* check timing between to commands */
00236         gettimeofday(&now,&here);
00237         timersub(&now,&lastcommand,&diff);
00238         //printf("elapsed: %ld.%.6ld\r\n",diff.tv_sec,diff.tv_usec);
00239 
00240         if(diff.tv_usec > 100000 || !timeflag)
00241         {
00242           lastcommand.tv_sec  = now.tv_sec;
00243           lastcommand.tv_usec = now.tv_usec;
00244 
00245           printf("%s\n",echoBuffer);
00246           /* Send the command to the robot */
00247           echoStringLen = strlen(echoBuffer);
00248           if (send(sock, echoBuffer, echoStringLen, 0) != echoStringLen)
00249             DieWithError("send() sent a different number of bytes than expected");
00250           /* Receive the same string back from the server */
00251           totalBytesRcvd = 0;
00252           printf("Received: ");                /* Setup to print the echoed string */
00253           while (totalBytesRcvd < echoStringLen)
00254           {
00255             /* Receive up to the buffer size (minus 1 to leave space for
00256                a null terminator) bytes from the sender */
00257             if ((bytesRcvd = recv(sock, echoBuffer, RCVBUFSIZE - 1, 0)) <= 0)
00258               DieWithError("recv() failed or connection closed prematurely");
00259             totalBytesRcvd += bytesRcvd;   /* Keep tally of total bytes */
00260             echoBuffer[bytesRcvd] = '\0';  /* Terminate the string! */
00261             printf(echoBuffer);            /* Print the echo buffer */
00262           }
00263 
00264           printf("\n");    /* Print a final linefeed */
00265 
00266           sendflag = 0;
00267         }
00268       }
00269 
00270       /* Read the next event */
00271       readevent = read (fd, &e, sizeof(struct js_event));
00272     }
00273 
00274     close(fd);
00275     close(sock);
00276     exit(0);
00277 }
